TextView.android:text: 1 Brief Forms Here is another group of nine brief forms for very common words. Learn them well!
Be is also used as a word beginning in words such as believe and because.
2 Words Ending -ly The common word ending -ly is represented by the e circle.
• Observe that in highly the small circle for -ly is written inside the large circle; that in daily it is added to the other side of the d after the a has been written.

3 Amounts and Quantities When you take dictation in the business office, you will frequently have occasion to write amounts and quantities. Here are some devices that will enable you to write them rapidly.
• Observe that the n for hundred and the ith for thousand are placed underneath the figure.
